name: sb.teleport
description: Spark Industries used some minor sorcery to reimagine Teleportation UI.

scripts.prebuild: echo Copy non-TS files verbatim to output dir && copyfiles --error --up 1 --exclude './src/@types/**/*.*' -e './src/@types-mods/**/*.*' -e './src/**/*.ts' -e './**/*.d.ts' --verbose './src/**/*' './'

author: MelOzone
